name: A Gift from a Friend
effect:
Permanent (2)

name: A Snake Hiding in the Dark
effect:
Permanent (3)

effect:
Sand | Male | Advisor | Mental Power: 3

Your "Sand" Ninjas cannot be affected by the effects of your opponent's Mission cards.

Leaf | Male | Anbu | Mental Power: 1

Leaf | Male | Jonin | 12 Shinobi Guardians

Ninjas that are in the same Team as this Ninja cannot be removed from play by the effects of your opponent's Jutsu cards during this turn. If this effect was applied, at the end of the turn, if this Ninja remains in play, discard this Ninja.

Permanent (3)

effect:
Leaf | Female | Kurama Clan | Mental Power: 1 | Growth
[WITH A MONSTER WITHIN]Your opponent's Ninja with an Entrance cost of 2 or less that do not have a "Genjutsu" Combat Attribute get -2/-0.
"She didn't want me to become a genjutsu user."

name: Yoshino Nara
effect:
Leaf | Female | Chunin
[AS A MOTHER]
While you have another Ninja that has "Nara" in its name in play, this Ninja gets + 3 Mental Power.
While this Ninja is Battling in the same Team with another Ninja that has "Nara" in its name, this Ninja's Team and the Team Battling against it perform a Mental Power Battle.
"Only one 'Yes' is enough!"

name: Yotaka
effect:
Star | Male | Surge
[PLUNDER]
During the Exchange of Jutsu, you can move Growth coin from 1 of your opponent's Ninjas Battling against this Ninja to this Ninja.
"Are you saying that she took the star?"

name: Yugao Uzuki
effect:
Leaf | Female | Anbu | Name: Anbu
[VISITING A GRAVE]
While this Ninja is in your hand, when your "Special Jonin" and/or "Anbu" Ninja is discarded due to the Showdown, you can put this Ninja card in play.
Valid: While you have 1 or more "Special Jonin" and/or "Anbu" Ninja cards in your Discard Pile, this Ninja gets +2/+0.
"Kakashi-senpai, are you visiting Obito's grave? You should come earlier rather than coming up with excuses for being late."

name: Yugito Ni'i
effect:
Cloud | Female | Jonin | Surge
[TRAP]
Valid: During your Mission Phase or the Exchange of Jutsu, if this Ninja is in injured status, you can move this Ninja to your Chakra area. In that case, search your Deck for 1 "Two Tails" Ninja card and put it in play in the same place as this Ninja was. Then, shuffle your Deck.
"I am the one who trapped you!"

name: Zetsu
effect:
Akatsuki | Rogue Ninja | Jonin | Male | Ambush
[THE MOST UNEXPECTED]
Your opponent cannot play any Permanent Mission cards.
Valid: During your Mission Phase, you can remove this Ninja from game. In that case, discard 1 of your opponent's in-play Permanent Mission cards.
"IT SEEMS LIKE THEY HAVE ARRIVED."

name: Ziga
effect:
Three Criminals | Male | Ambush | Surge
[MAGNETIC FORCE]
When this Ninja is sent out to Attack, you can select 1 of your opponent's Ninjas with an Entrance cost of 1 or less. In that case, during the Exchange of Jutsu, if this Ninja's Team is not poopsed, move the selected Ninja to the Battlefield as a Team of 1 Ninja Battling against this Ninja's Team.
"Yeah, my ninjutsu Is Ninja Art Magnet!!"
